    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public void validate(Combination combo)
        Validates that all required parameters have been specified (or appropriate defaults have been set) in the pom. Missing or invalid parameters will result in an exception being thrown.
        Parameters:
        combo - Combination combo that will have its default values set
